text: A Choice Selection of Strawbs is a compilation album of songs by Strawbs. ==Track listing== Source: StawbsWeb ==Personnel== *Dave Cousins – lead vocals, backing vocals, guitar, dulcimer (all tracks) *Tony Hooper – backing vocals, guitar (tracks 6,7,10,12) *Dave Lambert – lead vocals, backing vocals, guitar (tracks 1,2,3,4,8,9,11,13,14,15,16) *John Ford – lead vocals, backing vocals, bass guitar, acoustic guitar (tracks 1,3,5,6,7,10,12,13,15,16) *Chas Cronk – backing vocals, bass guitar (tracks 2,4,8,9,11,14) *Richard Hudson – backing vocals, drums, percussion, sitar (tracks 1,3,5,6,7,10,12,13,15,16) *Rod Coombes – drums (tracks 2,4,8,9,11,14) *Rick Wakeman – keyboards (tracks 5,6,12) *Blue Weaver – keyboards (tracks 1,3,7,10,13,15,16) *John Hawken – keyboards (tracks 2,4,8,11) *Robert Kirby – keyboards (track 9) *John Mealing – keyboards (track 9) ==Release history== {|class="wikitable" ! Region ! Date ! Label ! Format ! Catalog |- | | | A&M; | CD | CDMID 173 |- | | | A&M; | cassette | CDID 173 |} ==References== Category:1992 compilation albums Category:Strawbs compilation albums Category:A&M; Records compilation albums
title: A Choice Selection of Strawbs
